Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Beta-Casein 197 (protein-derived, Leu-rich; natural AMPs; humans, primates, mammals, animals. BBMm, UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 33.3% similarity toinsect Melectin.  Molecular formula:   C93H151N21O26; Mol Wt 2005.35; GRAVY= 0.106; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide: 1.25   kcal/mol. This peptide corresponds to residues 197-213 of beta-casein. Synthetic peptide is active against E. coli, S. aureus, and Y. enterocolitica.
Literature Information.Author: Fu Y, Ji C, Chen X, Cui X, Wang X, Feng J, Li Y, Qin R, Guo X.2017
Literature Information.Title: Investigation into the antimicrobial action and mechanism of a novel endogenous peptide ?-casein 197 from human milk.
